page.title: 03SPORT IN STROOD
page.content: Medway A.C. is an athletics club held on Tuesday and Thursday nights. There are three types of running groups, sprint (100m, 200m, 400m), middle distance (800m, 1500m), and long distance (up to a marathon - 26 miles). F.L.T.C. stands for Frindsbury Lawn Tennis Club. The club is for anyone over the age of twelve as long as they have a tennis racquet and white tennis kit. Strood swimming pool is open everyday.When the five o'clock session starts they put the rubber tyres out into the water along with a large inflatable octopus or sometimes a dog. There are large foam mats which float and the session finishes at eight. By Paula Bainbridge, Jane Haward and Heather Macdonald. Chapter School
